Job Description: Responsibilities       Program welldesigned, maintainable, testable and efficient code        Perform white box and black box testing        Troubleshoot, debug, fix and enhance existing software        Execute full software development lifecycle        Prepare specifications, designs and test scenarios/ cases        Demonstrate the development and testing results to team or leader        Maintaining and supporting products and projects       Skills:       Experience in switch embedded system software development        Experience in Linux kernel internals and architecture        Experience in networking platform infra, drivers        Proficient in C , Python        Strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills        Experience in VMs/Dockers/Container is a plus        Good to have a knowledge in toolchain/Makefile
